hanzi-su-wiki:
乳

Значения

Молоко

Мнемоника

Поглаживать рукой 爫 ребёнка 子, чтобы тот лучше сосал льющуюся зигзагом 乚 струйку молока.

heisig_chinese_memo: A fledgling is hooked on its mother's breast milk. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: milk, fledgling, claw, vulture, child, fishhook
koohiiStory1: A fledgling is being nursed at a zoo, it is fed milk through a small tube that is bent in the shape of a hook (so that it fits inside its beak). The fledgling soon becomes addicted to milk, giving us this very catchy mnemonic: “fledgling hooked on milk”.
koohiiStory2: Drinking milk not only reduces cavity (#96)´s but also strengthens nails (claws) thanks astgtciv.
jp_example_words:
乳(ちち): milk, breast, loop
牛乳(ぎゅうにゅう): cow´s milk
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Giving cleats to a child carrying an umbrella is the best way to gather milk. You don’t have any containers, so the child has to hold milk in the upside-down umbrella. The cleats are so the child can run back and forth to transport the milk around.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: See this child running in his cleats. Picture him holding the umbrella upside-down, milk sloshing all about as he runs.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: But where is this child exactly? He’s in New (にゅう) York City. What’s he doing in New York City you ask? Well, he's milking a cow. Why is there a cow to be milked in New York City? Good question. It’s the end of the world and New York City is the last remaining civilization. This is how people live now. Milk is important.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine post-apocalyptic New York City. Milk is a hot commodity here so it’s important not to spill any of the milk. Imagine yourself carrying the milk in the umbrella and being careful not to spill any of it.
Ru_trainchinese: rǔ: (графема) молоко; кормить молоком; грудь, (у скота) вымя; млечный сок; новорожденный; рожать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the second (乚) nourishment (孚) is milk
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A fledgling is hooked on its mother's breast milk. &nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze woman's shape to simplify it as " Bao " (like a leaned over and reached the people), " Bao case" or by " mouth " shaped " mouth " shape is hand-shaped Rumor, " test ", " old "The shape of the hand from which " filial piety " has changed has become " mouth " (Zhao Pingan, Chen Jian, Wu Zhenwu, Guo Yongbing).

The oracle bone inscription is used as the original meaning, "Collection" 22246: "姼乳", "姼" is the name of a person, referring to the breast feeding.

Bronze inscription is used as the name of the musical rhythm. Zeng Hou Yizhong: "Lei Ru", that is, "Lei chaos" in ancient books. It is also known as " ru ", which means young, and Linghu Jun pot: "ru (ru) child".

Bamboo slips from the Warring States Period are also faked as " ru ", "Tsinghua Jane One. "Chuju" Jane 11: "Ru (ru) son".

"Shuowen": "Milk, people and birds give birth to children called breasts, and beasts call birth. From the Fu from 𠃉. 𠃉, the Xuanniao is also. "Mingtang Moon Order": "On the day when the Xuanniao arrives, the temple is in Gaoqi, with Please the son." So the breast is from 𠃉. The person who pleases the son must be on the eve of the day, 𠃉 the spring equinox, the autumn equinox, the migratory bird in the birth, the official of the Emperor Shaohao."
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The oracle elephant woman stretches out her hand and embraces the child with her mouth open to breastfeed. The original meaning is breastfeeding and feeding.
humanum_full_description:
金文把婦人之形簡省為「勹」(像俯身伸手之人)，「勹」下或增「口」形，「口」形是手形的訛變，「考」、「老」、「孝」所從的手形即有訛變為「口」(趙平安、陳劍、吳振武、郭永秉)。

　　甲骨文用作本義，《合集》22246：「姼乳」，「姼」是人名，指姼餵乳。

　　金文用作樂律名，曾侯乙鐘：「羸乳」，即傳世古書中的「羸亂」。又通假為「孺」，表示年紀幼小，令狐君壺：「乳(孺)子」。

　　戰國竹簡也通假作「孺」，《清華簡一．楚居》簡11：「乳(孺)子」。

　　《說文》：「乳，人及鳥生子曰乳，獸曰產。从孚从𠃉。𠃉者，玄鳥也。《明堂月令》：『玄鳥至之日，祠于高禖，以請子。』故乳从𠃉。請子必以𠃉至之日者，𠃉春分來，秋分去，開生之候鳥，帝少昊司分之官也。」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文象婦人伸手攬張口的孩子入懷以餵乳之形。本義是哺乳、餵哺。

①分泌奶的器官：乳房(亦称“乳”、“奶子”)。乳峰。乳罩。
②乳房中分泌出来的白色甜汁：乳汁(亦称“奶”)。哺乳。乳母(奶妈)。乳臭未干(对年幼人表示轻蔑)。
③像乳汁的东西：豆乳。乳胶。乳腐(亦称“腐乳”)。
④像乳头的东西：钟乳(钟上可敲打的突出物)。钟乳石。
⑤生，生殖：孳乳。
⑥初生的、幼小的：乳燕。乳牙。乳名(小名)。

乳字的基本解释

乳
rǔ
分泌奶的器官：乳房（亦称“乳”、“奶子”）。乳峰。乳罩。
乳房中分泌出来的白色甜汁：乳汁（亦称“奶”）。哺乳。乳母（奶妈）。乳臭（xi?）未干（对年幼人表示轻蔑）。
像乳汁的东西：豆乳。乳胶。乳腐（亦称“腐乳”）。
像乳头的东西：钟乳（钟上可敲打的突出物）。钟乳石。
生，生殖：孳乳。
初生的、幼小的：乳燕。乳牙。乳名（小名）。

乳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rǔ］
［《廣韻》而主切，上麌，日。］
(1)乳房。
(2)生子；分娩。
(3)形容哺乳期间的动物。见“乳虎”、“乳狗”。
(4)幼小。
(5)柔嫩。
(6)鸟兽等产卵、产子。
(7)奶汁。
(8)喂奶；哺育。
(9)饮。
(10)泛称象奶汁的东西。指钟乳石水。
(11)泛称象奶汁的东西。指泉水。
(12)泛称象奶汁的东西。指树脂。
(13)乳花，烹茶所起的乳白色泡沫。
(14)钟乳石。
(15)象乳头状的东西。
(16)指钟乳。古代钟面上凸出如乳头状的饰物。
(17)比喻顶端。
(18)草鞋上穿绳子的两耳，因其隆起如乳头状，故称。
(19)研磨。

乳字的英文翻译

◎ 乳
breast, breed, milk

乳字的康熙字典解释

【子集上】【乙字部】　乳； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页84第17
【唐韻】而主切【集韻】【韻會】蘂主切，?音擩。【廣韻】柔也。　又湩也。【白虎通】文王四乳，是謂至仁。又【禮·月令·註】燕以施生時來巢人堂宇孚乳。　又天乳，星名。在氐宿北。【列星圖】天乳明，則甘露降。　又馬乳，蒲萄子別名。【本草圖經】子似馬乳。　又石鐘乳。【桂海虞衡志】桂林宜融山洞穴中，凡石脈涌處爲乳牀，融結下垂，其端輕薄中空，水乳且滴且凝，紋如蟬翼者勝。　又竹乳。【開寶本草】竹乳者，其山洞徧生小竹，以竹津相滋，乳如竹狀，其性平。　又鐘四帶有乳。【周禮·冬官考工記註】篆閒之枚也。聲之震動在此，以其乳可數，故曰枚。　又【溪蠻叢笑】麻陽有銅鼓，江水中掘得，如大鐘，長筩三十六，乳重百餘觔。　又【韻補】叶如又切，柔去聲。【易林】胎卵胞乳，長大成就，君子萬年，動有福佑。　【說文】从孚从乙。乙者?鳥。人及鳥生子曰乳，獸曰產。◎按《荀子·榮辱篇》乳彘觸虎，乳狗不遠遊，則獸亦稱乳矣。

乳字的源字形

乳字的起名意思

生子，生产。也指奶汁。

milk
Basic explanation of words
milk
rǔ
The organ that secretes milk: breast (also known as "milk", "milk"). Rufeng. bra.
White sweet juice secreted from the breast: milk (also known as "milk"). breast-feeding. Nursing mother (nanny). Milky smell (xi?) is not dry (contempt for young people).
Something like milk: soy milk. emulsion. Tofu (also known as "fermented bean curd").
Things like nipples: stalactites (protrusions that can be struck on the clock). Stalactites.
Birth, reproduction: breastfeeding.
Newborn, young: Ruyan. Deciduous teeth. Milk name (nickname).
milk
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [rǔ]
["Guangyun" and the main cut, the upper 麌, the day. ]
(1) Breasts.
(2) Give birth; give birth.
(3) Describe animals during breastfeeding. See "milk tiger" and "milk dog".
(4) Young.
(5) Tenderness.
(6) Birds and beasts lay eggs and children.
(7) Milk juice.
(8) Breastfeeding; nursing.
(9) Drink.
(10) It is generally called something like milk juice. Refers to stalactite water.
(11) It is generally called something like milk juice. Refers to spring water.
(12) It is generally called something like milk juice. Refers to resin.
(13) Milk flower, milky white foam from cooking tea.
(14) Stalactites.
(15) Something like a papilla.
(16) Refers to stalactite. The face of an ancient clock protrudes like a nipple-shaped ornament.
(17) A metaphor for the top.
(18) The two ears on the straw sandals that wear the rope are called because they are bulging like nipple.
(19) Grinding.
milk
English translation of words
◎ milk
breast, breed, milk
milk
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Subset Part One】【B Word Department】　乳; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 84 Page 17
[Tang Yun] and the main cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] The core of the main cut, the sound? [Guang Yun] Soft too.　Yeah again. 【Baihutong】The four breasts of the King of Wen are the most benevolent. Also【ritual·monthly order·note】Yan Yi came to the nest room when he gave birth to Yufu's milk.　Ten Milk, star name. In the north of Disu. [Star Chart] When the sky is milky, the nectar will descend.　 Also horse milk, another name for Pu Grape. [This sketch book] The child is like a horse's milk.　Stalactite again. [Guihai Yu Hengzhi] In the cave of Yirong Mountain in Guilin, where the stone veins flow is a breast bed, which melts and droops, its end is thin and hollow, and the water is dripping and condensed, and the one with the pattern like cicada wings wins.　Bamboo milk again. [Kaibao Materia Medica] For those with bamboo milk, small bamboos grow in their caves, which are nourished by bamboo and tress. The milk is like bamboo, and its nature is flat.　Zhong Si has breasts again. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji Annotation】The seal of Xianxian. The vibration of the sound is here, and it can be counted by its milk, so it is called a coin.　[Ximan Congxiao] There is a bronze drum in Mayang, which is dug in the river, like a big bell, with thirty-six long horns, and the weight of milk is more than a hundred tendons.　【Rhyme Filling】Ye Ru cuts again, softly. [Yi Lin] Fetal ovarian milk, grown up, a gentleman will be blessed for thousands of years.　【Said Wen】Congfu Congyi. The second? Bird. People and birds give birth to babies, and beasts give birth. ◎According to "Xunzi: Honor and Disgrace", the breasts touch the tiger, and the breasts do not swim far away, so the beasts are also called breasts.
milk

Грудь сердце
Кай
Слово «молоко» в надписях на оракульной кости действительно является шедевром искусства: несколькими штрихами сцена кормления ребенка грудью матери, включая детали, передается до мельчайших деталей.
Первоначальное значение - «рождение».
«Гуаня»: «Грудь, рождение». Оно также имеет значения «грудь», «молоко» и «кормление».
молоко
| Цинь Цзяньвэнь
Сяохао
Запуск скрипта
Упрощенные символы
Название молока
E み
rǔ
I сущ.
1) груди; вымя; сосцы
小儿哺乳 маленький ребёнок сосёт грудь
2) сосок; сосцевидный выступ (предмета)
3) молоко; молочные продукты; млечный сок
常饮牛乳 постоянно пить коровье молоко
4) новорождённый, детёныш; сосунок, грудной (ребёнок)
乳狗 щенок-сосунок
乳鸭 утёнок
II гл.
1) кормить грудью; кормить клювом (птенцов)
绝其乳哺 отказаться кормить ребёнка грудью
2) рождать; приносить детёнышей; появляться на свет
怀子不乳 понести ребёнка, но не родить
其十一月乳 он родился в ноябре месяце
3) нести яйца
雉雊鸡乳 фазанья самка несёт яйца как курица
III словообр.
в сложных терминах (напр. в биологии, химии) соответствует корням молочно-, лакто-, галакто-; напр. ср. 蛋白石 опал; опаловый, и 乳蛋白石 молочный опал; 球蛋白 глобулин, и 乳球蛋白 лактоглобулин; 乳单糖 лактоза; 钟乳石 сталактит
4 прил. светло-кремовый
Radicals: 子, 乚  (child, umbrella, cleat)
Meaning Mnemonic
Giving cleats to a child carrying an umbrella is the best way to gather milk. You don’t have any containers, so the child has to hold milk in the upside-down umbrella. The cleats are so the child can run back and forth to transport the milk around.
See this child running in his cleats. Picture him holding the umbrella upside-down, milk sloshing all about as he runs.
Reading Mnemonic
But where is this child exactly? He’s in New (にゅう) York City. What’s he doing in New York City you ask? Well, he's milking a cow. Why is there a cow to be milked in New York City? Good question. It’s the end of the world and New York City is the last remaining civilization. This is how people live now. Milk is important.
Imagine post-apocalyptic New York City. Milk is a hot commodity here so it’s important not to spill any of the milk. Imagine yourself carrying the milk in the umbrella and being careful not to spill any of it.
